flavor_text: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
With its sharp glare it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokemon.
It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.
When it's happy GLAMEOW demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail like a dancing ribbon.
